panels.description: The uptime of the Java virtual machine
panels.title: Process Uptime

panels.description: The starttime of the Java virtual machine
panels.title: Process Start Time

panels.description: The number of processors available to the Java virtual machine
panels.title: Processor Count

panels.description: The sum of the number of runnable entities queued to available processors and the number of runnable entities running on the available processors averaged over a period of time
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: Number of warn level events that made it to the logs
panels.title: Warn Events

panels.description: Number of debug level events that made it to the logs
panels.title: Debug Events

panels.description: Number of error level events that made it to the logs
panels.title: Error Events

panels.description: Number of trace level events that made it to the logs
panels.title: Trace Events

panels.description: Number of info level events that made it to the logs
panels.title: Info Events

panels.description: The peak live thread count since the Java virtual machine started or peak was reset
panels.title: JVM Threads Peak

panels.description: The current number of live daemon threads
panels.title: Live Daemon Threads

panels.description: The current number of live threads including both daemon and non-daemon threads
panels.title: Live Total Threads

panels.description: An estimate of the number of buffers in the pool
panels.title: Buffer Count

panels.description: An estimate of the memory that the Java virtual machine is using for this buffer pool
panels.title: Buffer Mem Used

panels.description: An estimate of the total capacity of the buffers in this pool
panels.title: Buffer Capacity

panels.description: The maximum amount of memory in bytes that can be used for memory management
panels.title: Max Memory

panels.description: The amount of used memory
panels.title: Used Memory

panels.description: The amount of memory in bytes that is committed for  the Java virtual machine to use
panels.title: Committed Memory

panels.description: Max size of old generation memory pool
panels.title: Max Data Size

panels.description: Size of old generation memory pool after a full GC
panels.title: Live Data Size

panels.description: Count of positive increases in the size of the old generation memory pool before GC to after GC
panels.title: Promotion Rate

panels.description: Incremented for an increase in the size of the young generation memory pool after one GC to before the next
panels.title: Allocation Rate

panels.description: Time spent in GC pause
panels.title: Pause Count

panels.description: Time spent in GC pause
panels.title: Pause Duration

panels.description: The number of classes that are currently loaded in the Java virtual machine
panels.title: Classes Loaded

panels.description: The total number of classes unloaded since the Java virtual machine has started execution
panels.title: Classes Unloaded

panels.description: Count of servlet requests
panels.title: HTTP Requests Rate

panels.description: Timer of servlet requests
panels.title: HTTP Requests Time
